Articles.Content:
Atlas corporation is proud to unveil its first (And only!) Interceptor System jet!

The IS1 is a VTOl jet designed to be able to at a short notice, and take down enemy bombers or other craft.

With a Wheesley-Whiplash(TM) Cruise jet, she's definitely capable of getting up to her cruising speed quickly!

The beta version shown here is only equipped with a 20mm Minigun for now, due to weight issues with the missiles. However, that doesn't hamper the ability at all!

The VTOL section under the aircraft has two Panther-Juno engines, propelling it vertically at takeoff and landing. The VTOL capabilities allow it to be placed in a small area, however landing may require a short airstrip. (Warranty void if used for unsanctioned naval operations) 

I've run out of filler, so here are the pictures. Let's hope they're really worth a thousand words!
